title: 迷你装-1.8
author: Little_Orange
txt_content:
做了一天的指令，终于好了。这个指令是用皮革套的颜色迅速更换形成的效果。
其实十分简单（误吐槽）/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~ ~ ~-1 ~-104 ~ redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/gamerule commandBlockOutput false},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-103 ~2 minecraft:stone},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-3 ~-102 ~2 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/fill ~2 ~ ~-2 ~3 ~110 ~-2 replies.author: 青格大D
replies.txt_content:
录像不一定要成为籽岷才有权利录。

在论坛发图需要使用图床，方法百度。
